mapper.select: select c.no as no, c.name as name, c.`desc` as description, c.blog_id as blogId , p.post_count as postCount from category c LEFT JOIN ( select count(*) as post_count , category_no from post group by category_no) p ON p.category_no =c.no where c.blog_id = #{id }
mapper.delete: delete from category where no = #{categoryNo } and category.name != '미분류'
mapper.select: select no, title, contents, reg_date as regDateTime, category_no as categoryNo from post where category_no = #{categoryNo }
